thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another excellent stay
thread.title_full: Another excellent stay - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CBlakemore
title: Another excellent stay
text:
A great little hotel Close to Times Square
Very welcoming and helpful staff.
The hotel is only a few yards from Times Square a very convenient location.
The rate includes continental breakfast together with refreshments available throughout the day and best of all cheese and wine served between five and eight every evening any in a very comfortable lounge called Rics Cafe
I stayed for one night in March on way home from Florida with my wife and will certainly stay again when next visiting New York
Whilst only small it provides all the amenities you need Continental breakfast, refreshments available through the day and cheese and wine in the evenings all included in rate
